subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: A day after a loss to the last-place Cavaliers, the Knicks acknowledged that the pairing of Carmelo Anthony and Amar’e Stoudemire would not click right away.
snippet: A day after a loss to the last-place Cavaliers, the Knicks acknowledged that the pairing of Carmelo Anthony and Amar’e Stoudemire would not click right away.
